law.catch_line: Annual evaluation of family preservation services.
law.history: Amended 2005 Ky. Acts ch. 99, sec. 208, effective June 20, 2005. -- Amended 1998 Ky. Acts ch. 426, sec. 172, effective July 15, 1998. -- Amended 1992 Ky. Acts ch. 319, sec. 1, effective July 14, 1992. -- Created 1990 Ky. Acts ch. 265, sec. 6, effective July 13, 1990.
